titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 444) to require that, if the President's fiscal year 2014 budget does not achieve balance in a fiscal year covered by such budget, the President shall submit a supplemental unified budget by April 1, 2013, which identifies a fiscal year in which balance is achieved, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-8, by Mr. Woodall.

The resolution waives all points of order against consideration of the bill, and amendments printed in the report. Each amendment shall not be subject to amendment, and shall not be subject to a demand for division of the question in the House or in the Committee of the Whole.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 3.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 48.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 188 (Roll no. 33).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 189 (Roll no. 34).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/4/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 444) to require that, if the President's fiscal year 2014 budget does not achieve balance in a fiscal year covered by such budget, the President shall submit a supplemental unified budget by April 1, 2013, which identifies a fiscal year in which balance is achieved.
